explains: n. 优秀策划者；才子；幕后操纵者

sentences.en: He was the mastermind behind the plan to acquire the explosives.
sentences.cn: 他是获取炸药计划的幕后操纵者。

sentences.en: The Empress Dowager was the mastermind.
sentences.cn: 慈禧太后即是此事的主脑。

sentences.en: I've even got a few small mastermind groups that I'm part of.
sentences.cn: 甚至，还有几个大师级别的小组，而笔者也是其中一员。
